噧字的基本解释

噧
xiè
声音高而话多。

噧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiè］
［《廣韻》許介切，去怪，曉。］
［《廣韻》他達切，入曷，透。］
见“噧言”。

噧字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　噧； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页209第40
【唐韻】訶介切【集韻】許介切，?音譮。【說文】高气多言也。从口，蠆省聲。春秋傳曰：噧言。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?他達切，音闥。義同。　又【集韻】許倚切，音?。氣聲。　又一曰多言。　【集韻】亦作?。

噧字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
噧字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Puff
xiè
The voice is loud and talkative.
Puff
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiè］
["Guangyun" Xu Jieqie, go to blame, Xiao. ]
["Guangyun" he daqie, enters, and penetrates. ]
See "噧言".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　噧; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 209 to 40
[Tang Yun] He Jieqie [Ji Yun] Xu Jieqie,? Yin Zong. [Speaking] Highly arrogant and talkative. From the mouth, faintly sound. The Spring and Autumn Annals said: Hey words.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? He Daqie, Yin Na. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Xu Yiqie, sound?. Angry sound.　Another one said more words.　【Jiyun】also made?.
